name: Home
story: One day, you wake up at home and want to go on an adventure
nav: press 1 to go to the back yard, press 2 to go to your friend's house, press 3 to go to your bedroom

name: back yard
story: You are in the back yard and you see a spaceship and your car
nav: press 1 to enter the spaceship, press 2 to get into the car, press 3 to go to your bedroom

name: spaceship
nav: press 1 to land on moon, press 2 to land on mars, press 3 to land on jupiter

name: moon
nav: press 1 to go back to earth, press 2 to go to pluto, press 3 to go to the sun

name: earth
nav: press 1 to go back to spaceship,press 2 to land on clouds, press 3 to go to the sun

name: mars
nav: press 1 to find yourself in a dream, press 2 to go to the stars, press 3 to earth

name: jupiter
story: You are on the biggest planet trying to walk along its axis
nav: press 1 to go to the spaceship, press 2 to NASA, press 3 to land on pluto

name: pluto
story: You are freezing on pluto now
nav: press 1 to find yourself in a dream, press 2 to go back to earth, press 3 to go to mars

name: stars
story: You are on the star trying to open your eyes
nav: press 1 to go to the moon ,press 2 to clouds,press 3 to go back to earth

name: clouds
story: You are on the biggest cloud trying to relax on it
nav: press 1 to go to wake from a dream, press 2 to go back to earth,press 3 to go home

name: car
nav: press 1 to go to friend's house,press 2 to go ice skating ,press 3 to go to the library

name: friend's house
story: You are at your friend's place
nav: Press 1 to go Ice skating,. Press 2 to go to library, Press 3 to go home

name: Ice skating ring
story: You are visiting the Ice Skating Ring
nav: Press 1 to go get your car, Press 2 to go to library, Press 3 to go home

name: library
story: You are at the library and find it dead silent.
nav: Press 1 to go to friend's house, Press 2 to go for Ice skating, Press 3 to go to your car

name: sun
story: You are about to burn youself approaching the sun
nav: Press 1 to go to NASA, press 2 to go back to earth,press 3 to go to pluto

name: NASA
story: You are in NASA trying to explain your adventure.
nav: Press 1 to go on a spaceship, 2 to go back home, 3 to go back to the moon

name: Dream
nav: press 1 to go to wake up at home, press 2 to go to your bedroom, press 3 to go to friend's house

story: You found your way back home and win the game.
